description: Mariano delivers to the Killer the men who beat up his girlfriend, and the Killer is surprised by his own thirst for revenge. He begins to piece together the clues surrounding the hit that went wrong in Paris, but his pursuit of the truth leads him and Mariano right into an ambush! Â
name: Blood Ties, Part Two

description: Special Investigator to the Order of the Holy Sepulchre Eden Parish and Vatican soldier Michael Tysko have at last determined the reasons behind the murders of the exorcist nuns of The Sisterhood. Now they have to race against time to stop Eden's sister, Vanessa, and the Fraternitas Caprigenus - the Satanist cult under her command - from setting free an evil kept captive for centuries. An evil that if released will surely bring about the end of humanity! Â
name: Book Three

description: To be alive is to be at odds with the world. Man against nature. Man against man. The instinct to survive is what has made us who we are. In the year 2031 mankind's survival instinct is put to the test when a civil war in China spirals into global conflict. Nations are destroyed. Millions are killed. And for many, like US Air Force pilot Alec Killian, survival will mean shedding some of his humanity in exchange for biotech and machine. Is this the ultimate corruption of nature? Or the birth pains of a new chapter in mankind's evolution? From the team who brought you the acclaimed cyberpunk series Utopiates comes a sci-fi war epic for the post-millennial age. In the spirit of books and films such as Ghost in the Shell, Innocence, and Black Hawk Down, Titanium Rain follows one pilot's journey through mankind's worst, only to discover its best. Â
name: Alert Five

description: Things are getting out of control for the Autobots as Nemesis Prime's plan for the Expansion is reaching to a critical stage. Althought the Autobots are doing everything they can to stop the inevitable, maybe they cannot win this war that's being fought on several fronts. On Corata-Vaz, the Wreckers are impotent against Thunderwing. On Garrus-9, Nemesis Prime is destroying everything on his path and not even Optimus Prime is a match for him. On Ki-Aleta, Hot Rod finally found out what went wrong in the Omega Bunker (Spotlight: Hot Rod) and finally, on Gorlam Prime, Jhiaxus has one ace up to his sleeve now that Jetfire is about to take control over Thunderwing. Jhiaxus has activated his las guardian: Bludgeon.
name: Revelation: Part Three

description:
He's known by many names: Logan. Weapon X. Wolverine. One fact is certain, he's the best there is at what he does...and what he does isn't pretty!

The first of Peter David's occasionally seen and always entertaining Wolverine arcs, "The Gahenna Affair" sets Logan, Jessica Drew (Spider-Woman), and their friends up in adventure against a horde of vampires commanded by a biblical demon-god who goes way back with Wolverine--if only the mutant marvel could remember him! Collecting Wolverine #11-16.
name: Wolverine Classic TPB

description:
Reprints X-Force (Vol. 2) #1-6.

Â Rob Liefeld and Fabian Nicieza return to the characters they made famous! Cable, Domino, Cannonball, Shatterstar, Warpath and all the rest are back! New heroes, new villains, and big action...X-Force just the way you want it!
name: TPB

description:
New world order.

The Master of Magnetism embarks on a holy crusade to rescue his fellow mutants from the coming genetic conflagration with humanity... regardless of the cost to either side. The newly formed Acolytes, Magneto's devoted disciples, see him as their greatest salvation. Little do they realize their zeal will carry them to the ends of Earth - and above - when Magneto proclaims Asteroid M a haven for mutants everywhere, inciting a state of war between himself and the world's great powers! All that stands in the way of absolute chaos are the mutant heroes known as the X-Men, whose powers and abilities set them apart from a humanity that hates and fears them.

And should they survive this confrontation, the villainous Omega Red is waiting in the wings! Product of a covert communist experiment to create a new kind of killing machine, this super-soldiers' slightest touch will kill all those who stand against his mother country.

Collecting X-MEN (1991) #1-7
name: X-Men: Mutant Genesis

first_appearance_locations.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

location_credits.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

description:
Overview
The fearless tank police return in an all-new short story, Phantom of the Audience! What's the story with the new sport craze, Smartball? Will Leona's overzealous attitude get her kicked out of the Tank Police? Will squad commander Brenten ever finish typing his report? It's an ecological-dystopian- police procedural adventure/comedy as only master storyteller Masamune Shirow can do it!
name: Phantom of the Audience

description:
Overview
A twisted old man, gifted with extrasensory powers, silently holds sway over an entire block of apartments. The occupants are puppets for him to control. Life is his to give... and take. But suddenly there is a new voice in his head... and before he knows it, a young girl with her own battery of psychic abilities has arrived to challenge him!

From the creator of the acclaimed comic epic, Akira, comes an horrific tale of extrasensory powers, mind control, and psychic war! The excellent storytelling and exquisite artwork make this a must-have for manga fans as well as anyone who truly appreciates great comics.

Overview
Strange deaths continue at the Tsutsumi housing complex, and the police are stymied. They have suspects, but no motives for murder, and no way to explain the gruesome crimes, either! A young detective is beginning to unravel the mystery, but Cho is now possessing the residents with weaker minds... and compelling them to play his macabre and deadly game!

Overview
In the final confrontation between Cho, a jaded, childlike old man, and Etsuko, a fearless, innocent child, the entire building becomes their weapon of choice! Fueled by mutual hatred, these two combatants will not rest until one or the other is dead. Don't miss this explosive final issue!

name: In the Best of Families

description: Continued from FANTASTIC FOUR #31, it's the penultimate chapter of the "Mr. Fantastic in Dr. Doom's armor" saga! What if you had done something so terrible that your mind would not let you remember it? Due to the recent events in FANTASTIC FOUR, Reed Richards is far from his normal self. And to make matters worse, the FF are being assaulted on all sides by their worst enemies, and it's all Reed's fault! Plus: Special bonus back-up features! Just as THOR 2000 zigged from regular series and back again, so too does this Annual directly flow between FF #31 and FF #32. In other words, everybody who reads FANTASTIC FOUR will want this book, too!
name: Betrayal

description: Galactus! Kevin Maguire! Cool! The Devourer of Worlds is back... well, at least his head is! Why does his cranium crash into Times Square? And what does it have to do with Franklin Richards, Frankie Raye (the former Herald known as Nova), and a new villain named Abraxas? Find out in the Annual that kicks off a big story that rockets right into FANTASTIC FOUR #46! Plus: Jeph Loeb and Leinil Yu deliver a six-page bonus story called "Dragon Man For All Seasons!" Written by the ongoing title's regular team of co-plotters Carlos Pacheco, Rafael Marin and scripter Jeph Loeb, with pencils by Kevin Maguire and inks by Wade Von Grawbadger!
name: The Devil You Know

description: The United Nations has tried to for years to bring the nations of the world together, and facilitate peace. The gamma-enhanced super-villain, the Leader, likes that idea--he just thinks the best way to get it is for him to rule the planet! Now it's up to Hulk and his constant companions, teenager Rick Jones and Monkey the monkey, to save the UN from the big-brained baddie! But can even Hulk smash a whole army of the Leader's squishy pink androids?
name: Following The Leader

description: Reprints Fantastic Four (Vol. 2) #1-12.
name: Heroes Reborn: Fantastic Four

description:
Kenshin's battle with Raijuta to decide the fate of Meiji Era swordsmanship is coming to a head. One fact is quickly becoming apparent: Raijuta will stop at nothing to ensure the supremacy of his own school of sword-fighting! Reunited with a member of the former Sekiho Army - that doomed civilian unit - Sanosuke runs into trouble of his own. Old alliances are challenged when a plan to topple the current government by any means necessary is shared... and as his friend puts it, Sano's either "in" or he's "in the way." Plus a bonus installment containing the first story Nobuhiro Watsuki ever published!

Chapter Titles

  • Act 40: The Ideal Man
  • Act 41: The Second Secret Sword
  • Act 42: You've No Idea
  • Act 43: Settling the Score
  • Act 44: No Worries
  • Act 45: Extra: Sanosuke & Nishiki Paintings (1)
  • Act 46: Extra: Sanosuke & Nishiki Paintings (2)
  • Act 47: Extra: Sanosuke & Nishiki Paintings (3)
  • End-of-Volume Special (3): Crescent Moon in the Warring States
name: No Worries

description:
The Shinsengumi - fearsome and formidable protectors of the ShÃ´gunate. Kenshin knows them well, having done battle with them during the final days of the Meiji Restoration. One man in particular - SaitÃ´ Hajime, captain of the third unit - lingers in Kenshin's mind. Now an officer of the law and known as "Fujita GorÃ´", SaitÃ´ arrives on the steps of the Kamiya Dojo, challenging Kenshin to a duel that will force a reawakening of Kenshin's own past. But the confrontation with SaitÃ´ is just the beginning of something much larger, something that will involve the future of the new Japan...

Chapter Titles

  • Act 48: Resurrection of the Wolf
  • Act 49: Wolf Without Mercy
  • Act 50: Scheme
  • Act 51: Confrontation
  • Act 52: The Wolf's Fangs
  • Act 53: Agreement
  • Act 54: The One Who Stops the Two
  • Act 55: Enter Åkubo
  • Act 56: Meiji 11, May 14th - Morning
  • Act 57: Meiji 11, May 14th - Afternoon
name: In the 11th Year of Meiji, May 14th

description: The L.E.G.I.O.N. stages a triumphant return to Cairn...only to have Vril Dox fire one of them. Also, a horrifying mother/daughter reunion.
name: Bitter Victory

description: In this continuing spin-off of his award-wining masterpiece Epileptic, David B. focuses once again on his relationship with his ailing brother, but delves deeper into their fantasy life and obsession with history. In the second installment, two become fascinated by the Papuan Wars, and David discovers odd metaphorical parallels between those long-ago events and rituals and his brother's struggle with his disease.
name: Babel #2

description: The Skrulls have stricken Iron Man with an alien virus that renders his armor and technology useless! But Tony Stark plans for every possibility...so it's time to say hello to Tony's not-so-little friend--War Machine, weapon of s.h.i.e.l.d.! But can one man, even one as well-armed as James Rhodes, stand alone against a worldwide invasion? A major new chapter in both Tony and Rhodey's history begins here!
name: War Machine: Weapon of S.H.I.E.L.D. Part 1

description:
Krypton's greatest adversary has set his sights on Superman and his homeworld as his endless quest for absolute knowledge continues. But the horrors within Brainiac's ship are nothing compared to the alien behind it. Superman's world is about to change as the build-up to the Superman event of 2008 races towards its conclusion! SPOILERS!

Superman continues his fight with the real Brainiac, who has been asleep on his ship for centuries. Kal discovers Kandor and that Kara's parents, Kal's Aunt & Uncle, are alive in the city of Kandor. They explain how they got into the city. Supes & Brainiac duke it out as Metropolis gets bottled up and shrunk down.
name: Brainiac, Part 4 - Mind Over Matter

description:
Blythe races to understand the clues hidden in a mysterious letter from Zayn, one sent from a country that doesn't exist. Could it be connected to the feathered serpent that appears in her dreams? She'll find out when she sets off to rescue Zayn - and gets more than she bargained for.

Javad leaves Blythe in the middle of the night, but leaves a letter that she thinks has a decrypted message in it. She thinks it leads to the mythical country of Narimar, a country that existed between Pakistan and India.
name: Letters from Lost Countries Part 2

description:
Overview:

As the Lich King's plague of undeath ravages the human kingdom of Lordaeron, a mighty blade is forged from a dark orb! In the hands of Highlord Alexandros Mograine, the blade will become legend. In time, both blade and man will become . . . Ashbringer.
name: Death is Contagious

description: The stunning conclusion to the never-before-revealed early days of Ultimate Iron Man! Who is behind the plot to ruin Stark Enterprises? Why does this person want Tonyâs father dead? And can our young hero find it within himself to stop them?

Inquisitor Alastor's investigation leads him to track a cargo container carrying a dying Untouchable on it's way to the merchant House De Kyp on the planet Demarius Secunda. All evidence suggests that this is on the orders of the nefarious Damask Brothers. With his savant Pascal and backed by a squad of Adeptus Arbites, Alastor and his Retinue storm the Damask's island quarters. But can it all really be that simple?

The incredible story continues as the new, devastated world is revealed! The Wildcats find themselves battling a former ally â one who happens to be among the most powerful super-humans alive. Can the team withstand his assault on the HALO building?

Also, don't miss the backup story featuring chapter one of a Wetworks tale written by Christos Gage and illustrated by Brandon Badeaux!
name: After The End Of The World, Part Two

description:
Wolverine wants to watch hockey... If it were so simple! After a fiasco in the Danger Room, the girls fight over Colossus, and they smash the TV, so they have to face Wolverine in a real berseker rage!

Synopsis

It's the last night of a visit from Banshee and Moira MacTaggart and the X-Men are going out to a dinner and show. The seventh game of the Stanley Cup means that Logan is left home to babysit Siryn, Kitty, Amp, and Illyana. Before leaving, Colossus gives Siryn a note. Kitty wonders what's up since she has a crush on him.

The girls are bored and Siryn proposes they all check out the Danger Room. Kitty has reservations, but she casts them aside when she thinks of Siryn laughing about Kitty's immaturity with Colossus. Kitty opens the Danger Room and the ladies access the earliest program available: a Brotherhood of Evil Mutants simulation. Amp runs away with Illyana while Kitty and Siryn take on the robots. During the fight, Kitty asks about the note from Colossus. Siryn doesn't really answer, causing Kitty to stew even more in her rising jealousy. The fight ends when Illyana inadvertently opens a portal into the control room and hits the pause button. The girls leave the Danger while Logan continues watching his game.

The go to Kitty's room and play a game in which they tell secrets to each other. Kitty has to go first and she tells Amp about her fears concerning Siryn stealing Colossus from her. Amp tries to ease her mind by telling Kitty about a guy back at Muir that Siryn likes. Meanwhile, the robots un-pause and begin scanning the mansion for enemies to engage.

Illyana's turn in the closet has her trying to tell Kitty that she teleported through a wall. Kitty doesn't get it. The robots from the Danger Room have found Logan. Big mistake: they block the television. He dispatches the robots and returns to his "moral right as a Canadian."

Amp's turn in the closet reveals that she has a crush on a guy back on Muir Island named Dmitri. Siryn, however, bursts her bubble and reveals that she and Dmitri are fooling around. As a matter of fact, the cryptic note Colossus gave Siryn is a note to Dmitri in Russian. Amp is offended and tells Siryn that Kitty played a joke and had Colossus write a mean letter about Siryn instead. Then, using her emotion-boosting powers, turns Siryn onto Kitty. The ladies blast through a wall and crush Logan's television. Logan goes berserk and chases the girls around the house. Amp calms him down with her powers and then admits what she did. Logan has compassion on Amp and offers her some kind words.

When the X-Men return home, they find Logan cradling Amp on the sofa. Later, on the flight back to Muir, Amp and Siryn make up and Amp admits to forsaking Dmitri. She's got Logan on her mind.
name: Little Girls

first_appearance_locations.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

location_credits.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

description:
In 'Elminster at the Magefair,' a mysterious and dangerous errand takes the Sage of Shadowdale and the lovely Storm Silverhand to a gathering of the Forgotten Realms' mightiest wizards, while 'The Rigor of the Game' pits a gambler in the nightmare-haunted domains of Ravenloft against the infamous death knight, Lord Soth.

Forgotten Realms: Elminster at he Magefair, Part 1 of 2.

Ravenloft: The Rigor of the Game
We finally find out what had happened to Michonne when she meets up with Rick and Carl. They go out on the road to find some suitable shelter, and end up stuck in their car for a night.
name: Here We Remain, Pt. 4

description:
Cover: Steve Yeowell (The Red Seas)

  • Judge Dredd - Mutie Block (part 3) (John Wagner - Kev Walker)
  • The Red Seas - Old Gods (part 3) (Ian Edginton - Steve Yeowell)
  • A.B.C. Warriors - The Volgan War - Book Three (part 2) (Pat Mills - Clint Langley)
  • Stalag 666 (part 3) (Tony Lee - Jon Davis-Hunt)
  • Lobster Random - The Forget-Me-Knot (part 2) (Simon Spurrier - Carl Critchlow)
name: Prog 1602

description: A "Batman: R.I.P." tie-in! In part 1 of the 2-part "Outsiders No More," the team faces its greatest crisis ever! Could the absence of the Dark Knight mean the end of the Outsiders?
name: Outsiders No More, Part 1 of 2

description: With Tony Stark forced onto the sidelines, Norman Osborn has been tapped to bring in the fugitive super hero -- by all means necessary. Thatâs right, True Believer, the Thunderbolts are on the huntâ¦and Moon Knightâs their game. They know his name and address, so it shouldnât be too hard to find Marc Spector, should it? Guess again.
name: The Death of Marc Spector, Chapter Two

description: Hidden in secret tunnels beneath a rickety old cabin in the mountains of Tennessee is a library housing the entire history of the Spirit of Vengeance. The answer to every question Johnny Blaze has ever had about the Ghost Rider, it's all there... and Danny Ketch has just set it on fire. Plus, Blaze vs. Blackout and the debut of the all-new Caretaker!
name: The Former Things, Part Two: Requiem for a Caretaker

description: Batgirl, Marque and an unexpected ally cross swords â and daggers, spears and whips â with the deadly Daughters of David Cain! Also, Cassandra's worked hard to keep her private mission of vengeance secret from her allies â but is that enough?
name: Redemption Road, Chapter Three: Daughters

description: 4X - Bobby Drake is fed up with being treated like a kid by the X-Men; Johnny Storm is fed up with being treated like a kid by the Fantastic Four. When a chance encounter brings the two together, they decide to form a new superhero team. As fate would have it, Beetle and The Scorpion are looking to form a new villain team. Thanks to a tip off from Spider-Man, it's not long before there's a battle on!
name: 4X

first_appearance_locations.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

location_credits.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

description:
Origin of the Superman & Batman team-up retold. Atoman is the villain.

  1. "The Secrets Behind "The Secret Origins of the Superman/Batman Team" one page text piece by Roy Thomas.
  2. "The Secret Origins of the Superman and Batman Team!" written by Roy Thomas, penciled by Rich Buckler, inked by Frank McLaughlin, colored by Carl Gafford and lettered by John Costanza.
  3. Don't forget to check out Dial 'H' for Hero in Adventure Comics #485.
  4. "DC Profile #76 - Jose Delbo" by Michael C. Carmichael.
  5. "Ask the Answer Man!"
  6. "Hembeck" by Fred Hembeck.
  7. "Daily Planet" Volume 81 Issue 7 for the month of June 1981 edited by Bob Rozakis, production by Jodi Saviuk and lettered by Typeset. Featuring stories about Superman's Fortress of Solitude in tabloid form DC Special Series #26 Superman and His Incredible Fortress of Solitude. An all-new Earth-2 super-hero team unites to fight evil during World War II check out their first issue spectacular in All-Star Squadron #1. Wonder Woman searches out the Red Dragon in Wonder Woman #283. Check out the New Teen Titans in The New Teen Titans #11 and the Justice League of America faces the tarot cards in Justice League of America #194.

Notes:

  • 48 pages no ads.
  • 200th issue anniversary of the Superman-Batman team-ups in World's Finest Comics.
  • Superman, Batman, Robin, Lois Lane, Jimmy Olsen, Perry White and Steve Lombard of Earth-1 appears.
  • Superboy, Professor Carter Nichols, Pete Ross and Lana Lang of Earth-1 have cameo flashback appearances.
  • Superman, Batman, Robin, Lois Lane, Jimmy Olsen and Perry White of Earth-2 appears.
  • The four covers on the cover are: World's Finest Comics #84, World's Finest Comics #94, Superman #76 and Adventure Comics #275.
  • Special thanks to Jack C. Harris and E. Nelson Bridwell.
name: The Secret Origins of the Superman-Batman Team!

description:
1. The Secret Lois Lane Could Never Tell (Lois Lane, Superman, Jimmy Olsen, Morgan Edge / written by Cary Bates : reprinted from: Superman Family #181)

2. Valley of the Copper Moon (Batgirl / written by Elliot S! Maggin : reprinted from: Batman Family #6

3. The Wife of Superman (Lois Lane, Superman, Lana Lang, Perry White : reprinted from: Superman's Girlfriend Lois Lane #23)
An imaginary story

4. Lana Lang's Romance with Superman VI (Lana Lang, Superman, Lois Lane, Jimmy Olsen, Perry White : reprinted from: Superman's Girlfriend Lois Lane #86)Â 

5. Safari of Death (Rima the Jungle Girl / written by Robert Kanigher, edited by Joe Kubert : reprinted in: Rima the Jungle Girl #6)

6. The Madam Jekyll of Metropolis (Lois Lane, Superman, Jimmy Olsen, Perry White, Lucy Lane, Professor Potter, Lois Lane Fan Club : reprinted from: Superman's Girlfriend Lois Lane #36)
name: The Secret Lois Lane Could Never Tell

description:
1. The Yukon Wilderness Road to Riches (inside front cover)

Factual article about the Yukon Gold Strike

2. Sergeant Preston and the Mutiny's Survivor

3. Golconda Claim

4. Sergeant Preston and the Printed Tip-Off
name: Sergeant Preston of the Yukon

description:
1. Scarecrow Antenna (inside front cover)

2. The Mysterious Buckaroo

3. The Daily Carrot

4. Doughnuts

5. The Cloud Shooter

6. A Matter of Timing (inside back cover)

7. Bugs' Surf Board (back cover)
name: Bugs Bunny in the Mysterious Buckaroo

description:
Bullseye and the Thunderbolts target Spider-Man...in a way he's never been targeted before! Also: Oscorp's secret scandal, but who's behind it? Harry or Norman? And a classic Spider-Man foe returns to the fold! Spider-Man's Brand New Day is over, and now all that's left for him are NEW WAYS TO DIE!

List of Covers And Their Creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverJohn Romita Jr. & Dean V. White1
2nd2nd PrintingKlaus R. Janson, John Romita Jr. and Dean V. White2
VarVariantDavid Finch, Morry Jay Hollowell - "MO!" and Danny Miki3
name: New Ways to Die, Part Five: Easy Target

description:
Overview

One Young X-Man (or X-Woman, we're not telling!) is dead! But there are still more than ten mutants (you read that right) vying for membership on the team. Who will be left to carry on the X-Torch? Marc (AMAZING SPIDER-MAN, Eli Stone) Guggenheim and Yanick (ULTIMATE X-MEN) Paquette aren't telling -- except in this self-contained issue perfect for new readers!
name: San Francisco

description: Thought everything with Darwin was settled? Thought you knew the full scoop of Longshotâs showing up? Turns out you're wrong on both counts as the case takes an unexpected turn and X-Factor finds itself drawn into the mystery of the Karma Project.
name: Best Intentions

description: A young Cimmerian huntress--a character seen in Conan Vol. 0: Born on the Battlefield--and Horsa--an Aesir leader from The Frost Giant's Daughter--both cross paths with Conan as he continues his dangerous trek through the snowy mountain passes of Cimmeria. Fighting his way through the natural dangers of his barbaric homeland has been a welcome change from the mind games and treachery Conan found in the cities of the East, but there's an unfortunate lesson in treachery in store for Conan here, too. In a Richard Corben flashback sequence, Connacht--Conan's grandfather--seems to have found a role for himself working in a busy city, but as the old saying goes, "Fleas will find a dog . . . and trouble will find a Cimmerian."
name: Cimmeria (Part 3): Path of Mist

description:
Overview

Part 1 of the 2-part "Lost Cargo," a tale set in modern continuity told by Devin Grayson (NIGHTWING) with art by Jean-Jacques Dzialowski (BATGIRL) and Dan Green (Uncanny X-Men). With this story, LEGENDS returns to present continuity with stories that will impact Batman now and in the future! Catwoman is trying to crush a human slave trade run by the Lucky Hand Triad in Gotham City, but her timing couldn't be worse. While she's trying to wash the Lucky Hand off of the streets, another gang is looking to step into their place. The fireworks draw the attention of Batman andâ¦Matches Malone?
name: Lost Cargo

volume.name: Batman: Legends of the Dark Knight

description: Part 2 of the 2-part "Lost Cargo," a tale set in current continuity told by Devin Grayson (NIGHTWING) with art by Jean-Jacques Dzialowski (BATGIRL) and George Rodriguez. The clock is ticking on the lives of 30 exotic dancers, and Batman is nowhere to be found. But Catwoman and Matches Malone are on the case! Waitaminute...Catwoman is working with Matches!?
name: Lost Cargo Part 2 of 2

volume.name: Batman: Legends of the Dark Knight

description: The Greek Goliath is looking for some R&R after the events of "Sacred Invasion," and hopes to find it in the arms of ex-Renegade NAMORA. But there's no rest for warriors when the AMAZONS declare war on Atlantis! And these ain't your mama's Amazons -- is that why Amadeus Cho sides with them instead of Herc? Plus: ARES returns!
name: Love & War, Part 1

description: Padawan Zayne Carrick has come to confront the Jedi who framed him for the murder of his fellow students. Yet he and his former Masters are shocked by an unforeseen revelation--another failed Padawan, believed to be a devoted servant, unveils his own dark intentions!
name: Vindication, Part 2

volume.name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic

description: Also includes activity and puzzle pages
name: Bugs Bunny : Befuddled Befriender

description:
1. A Chart of the Travels of Popeye the Sailor in the Story of "Ghost Island" (inside front cover)

2. Ghost island

3. Smash

4. Ice Cream (inside back cover)

5. Swee'Pea's Doll (back cover)
name: Ghost Island

description: Â REAL SPACE. REAL TERROR. Concluding the prequel horror series to Electronic Arts' upcoming DEAD SPACE survival horror game! One by one the avenues of escape from the colony of Aegis VII are closed off. Survival seems impossible! But Neumann has a plan. Will it be their salvation? Or will the colony itself become nothing more than a dead space?Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â

In conjunction with the Hero Initiative, Marvel's top creators select their favorite stories featuring the groundbreaking artwork of Gene Colan - reprinted here in their entirety - and offer commentary on his prolific contributions to the comic-book industry, from TOMB OF DRACULA to DAREDEVIL to HOWARD THE DUCK!

The final year of GÃDLAND begins here! Adam Archer has an all-new mission â to breach the final frontier in the greatest rescue mission ever attempted! And introducing Leviticus and Vayikra! Why in the name of Iboga would you dare miss this issue?!
name: Book Twenty Five: The Mother Cutter

description:
Overview:

The smoke is clearing after the initial attack but who will be left standing? What hope do we have against the DECEPTICON war machine and what will it mean to the world when America is brought to its knees? Shane McCarthy, Guido Guidi, and variant cover artist Trevor Hutchison continue the carnage even as the mystery as to the fate of the missing AUTOBOTS deepens...
name: Issue 3

description: INTRODUCING NICK FURY'S SECRET WARRIORS! Do you have what it takes to be trained by the greatest agent in the world? Well, do you? Well, you probably don't, but thankfully he has gathered new heroes who just might!
name: [untitled]

description: Zatanna lends a hand when Manhunter's fears begin to take over her mind, while the Visionary sends his Scavengers after the Birds of Prey! Also: The Joker comes a-calling on Barbara Gordon!
name: Fear Itself

description: Supergirl and Raven team up to save San Francisco from a new super villain with deep roots in the DC Universe!
name: Fathers... Part 1: Past Tense

description: NOW MONTHLY! After the status quo altering events of the last issue, Gary Hampton, The Astounding Wolf-Man sets out in search of the creature responsible for the wreck his life has become: The Elder. This issue marks the beginning of a new story arc, picking up right where THE ASTOUNDING WOLF-MAN, VOL. 1 left off - a perfect jumping on point for new readers!Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â

Superman, Batman and Wonder Woman lead the heroes of the DCU against the machinations of their malevolent counterparts, resulting in a cataclysmic event that will change the world â but not like anyone involved expects. Plus, Hawkman and Gangbuster make their move to rescue Tarot, and Konvikt breaks loose.
name: We'll Finish Things Here; Scattered to the winds

description: The President of the United States is the most powerful person on the planetâbut what if the man in the office is an agent of a foreign government? Seven and Roberta journey to Beijing to make sure only Nixon returns from China! John Byrneâs first-ever Star Trek series concludes here!
name: Too Many Presidents

description:
Overview:

The Secret Invasion hits Asgardâ¦and Broxton, Oklahoma, isn't spared! As the Skrulls arrive and begin their massive assault on the Norse gods, Dr. Donald Blake has his hands full in a middle-school basement delivering a baby. Can Balder the Brave and Beta Ray Bill marshal Asgard's forces long enough, and fight back hard enough, to hold the line until the God of Thunder joins them? And can anybody survive the Skrull's secret weaponâ¦?
Chimera and Chloe are finally reunited, but all hell's breaking loose around them, especially when August General in Iron defies the Black King's orders and returns to China.
name: End of Times

description:
Meet Arachnophilia: this teenage outcast has found herself endowed with spider-like powers. Elsewhere, Ultimate Nick Fury learns why four astronauts returned to Earth transformed, and Nighthawk takes this opportunity to make his dramatic return!

Hyperion. Power Princess. Doctor Spectrum. Nighthawk. The Blur. Once they were a team of super heroes - a Squadron Supreme - but the greatest of the heroes vanished without a trace, leaving a beateen and damaged world behind them. Five years have passed.

The Icarus One - the first lunar mission in decades - returns to Earth and its crew is quickly hidden from the media. Disgraced spy Nick Fury smells a cover-up - and with Arcana Jones (a probability-altering ex-hero_ and Emil Burbank (a criminal genius) Fury breaks into Edwards Air Force Base and finds the crew - Jon and Cathy Mora, Ted Munn, and Peter Boyer - fantastically changed. The source of their transformation? An alien spore, like the one that gave the Squadron Supreme their powers years ago.

They are not the only "superior" beings to emerge: teen Nell Ruggles gains spider-like powers and uses them to attack her classmates; a man wrapped in a tattered flag and calling himself Old Soldier fights terrorists in Washington; tech-wizard Tucker Ford patrols the skies in a smart-suit of his own design.

Is the world ready for a new superhuman era? It might not have a choice, as the crew of the Icarus One use their new gifts to escape captivity, leaving Fury and his team behind to pick up the pieces...

Meet Arachnophilia-she's the kind of girl who always hoped the neighbors would describe her as "a quiet girl, who kept to herself"...right after she took out her homeroom with an automatic rifle. But now that this teenage outcast has found herself endowed with spider-like powers...life might just be looking up. Elsewhere, Ultimate Nick Fury learns why four astronauts returned to Earth transformed into something eerily familiar...and utterly fantastic. Meanwhile-Nighthawk takes this opportunity to make his dramatic return!
name: Power to the People! Part 3: Stand or Fall!

description: Guest-starring Luke Cage! As therapy sessions with Dr. Worth help Mavis Trent come to terms with the variant symbiote that dwells within her, we learn the secret behind her Payback identity and discover the role Luke Cage played in the formation of the True Believers. But past and present violently collide when efforts to solve the mystery of her father's murder lead Mavis into a lethal death trap from which there is no escape!
name: The Max Factor

description:
Overview:

The road to war continues as our country's newest recruits train to become the super soldiers of tomorrow, but not everyone makes it out alive!
name: Boot Camp

description: The hunters become the hunted as the X-Men let the Hellfire Cult know they won't be going down without a fight. Beast brings a special guest star to visit the Cult's latest victim. Cyclops and Karma chalk up a victim of their own. Nightcrawler's extracurricular activities are brought to light. And learn, for the first time, what Wolverine listens to while fixing his car. All this and the team leaps into battle against the Cult in a full-frontal assault...the prize, San Francisco!
name: SFX3: Beginning to See the Light

description: The repercussions from "Batman R.I.P." have shaken Robin to the core.With all his relationships fracturing and his place as both sidekick and son, boyfriend and best friend thrown into turmoil, how will Tim Drake determine the best course of action for his future? "Search for a Hero" begins an epic tale that could very well turn the Boy Wonder into a man!
name: Search for a Hero, Part 2: Life During Wartime

description: It's an AMERICAN SPLENDOR filled with personal growth for Harvey Pekar, as he learns to compromise with an artist, attends a town meeting, reaches a truce with his cat and learns new and interesting facts from the local barber, among other extraordinary tales of everyday existence. Featuring a heavy-hitting lineup of some of the top artists in comics.
name: You Get Old,You Can Fall Apart,We're A Winner

description: The Man of Steel has faced twelve super-challenges. Now, as Lex Luthor's brilliant, criminal machinations come together, what fate awaits the doomed Superman? This is the final, dramatic chapter of the incredible, award-winning 12-issue run of ALL STAR SUPERMAN by Grant Morrison, Frank Quitely and Jamie Grant â don't miss it!
name: Superman In Excelsis

description: On Knowhere, the Guardian's transdimensional HQ, fear and mistrust boil to the surface as the mismatched team attempts to uncover the Skrull agents in their midst! Who can they trust? And if the answer is "no one", what does that say about the future of the Galaxy's toughest protectors? Intrigue, suspense and Skrull-duggery await in the series that IGN.com says âWith a rip-roaringly good cast, trippy visuals, and a great cliffhanger to cap it all off, this has all but cemented its place in my pull list permanently.â
name: Deception

description:
Story 1 - Furies In Black Leather

story - Nancy Collins

Art - Simon Morse

Letters - Bill Oakley

Colors - Byron Talman And Electric Pickle

Story 2 - The Voice

Story - Rex Miller

Art - Stan Shaw

Letters - Bill Oakley

Colors - Electric Pickle

Cover And Contents - Martin Emond

Publisher - Glenn Danzig

Production Design - Jody Mahler

Managing Editor - Ruthie Smith Barlow

Associate Editor - Rick Alonso

General Manager - Lisa Kerr
name: Furies In Black Leather; The Voice

description: Election season is upon us, and the stakes have never been higher! An unknown villain is attempting to assassinate the presidential candidates, and only the heroes of the DCU stand in the way. As Green Lantern, Green Arrow, Superman, Batman and more try to learn the killer's identity, they are faced with the difficult task of reconciling their own personal ideals with the mission at hand.
name: Chapter One: The Green Endorsement

description: All-new tales! A free-form band composed of some of the best talent in the medium got together late one night in Vertigo's back room and cooked up the anthology VERTIGO JAM, a great place to experience a riff of Vertigo's ongoing monthly books. The first cut is an 8-page SANDMAN number by Neil Gaiman and Kevin Nowlan that explores some of the nooks and crannies of Dream's kingdom. Other tracks include a HELLBLAZER tale by Garth Ennis and Steve Dillon in which Constantine has an encounter with an old flame; a SHADE, THE CHANGING MAN piece in which our hero explores the religious morals and the carcass of a baneful priest, as recorded by Peter Milligan and Mike Allred; a DOOM PATROL tune by Rachel Pollack and Eric Shanower in which the team must contend with a pair of promiscuous spirits who have escaped from their headquarters; an ANIMAL MAN cut by Jamie Delano, Scot Eaton and Mark Pennington in which Buddy Baker and a straight-shooting fowl talk turkey; a haunting SWAMP THING melody about a ghost lost in the plant realm of the Green, composed by Nancy A. Collins, Phil Hester and Kim DeMulder; and the bizarre experimental sounds of KID ETERNITY by Ann Nocenti and Sean Phillips.
name: Louder Than Noise

description: When Raven's half-brothers return to claim her and unite Trigon's bloodline, Raven must choose which ties are stronger: the family she was born to, or the new family she has made.
name: I Know Your Heart Because I Know Mine

description:
Overview:

Magni returns to Ironforge, along with Lo'Gosh and his comrades in arms. In Stormwind, Marshall Windsor goes missing after stumbling upon clues to the disappearance of King Varian. It's off to Blackrock Depths for our heroes â but are they prepared for what they will find?
name: Descent

description: Deep beneath the Nebraska prairie lurks a vast bunker that has lain undisturbed for nearly four decades. Built by Tony Stark's long-lost father to survive a global holocaust, the subterranean city is accidentally discovered by a young boy who then gets lost in its depths. The modern-day Iron Man has to come to the rescue. Can he discover the reasons behind his father's mysterious disappearance too? Unfortunately, the complex is defended by an army of original gray Iron Man armor automatons, which could spell Armageddon for the Armored Avenger!
name: The Bunker

description: The epic "This Was Your Life, Wally West" kicks off in high gear as Flash faces a scary blast from the past in a new story written by Alan Burnett (Batman: The Animated Series, SUPERMAN/BATMAN). Plus, Keystone City is abuzz over the new threat in town, who just might be the finish line for the Flash!
name: This Was Your Life, Wally West Part One: Infested

description: Tony Stark has hired the world's greatest private investigator, Jessica Drew, to help him find his long-lost father. But when the Chameleon infiltrates Stark International under the guise of dear ol' Dad, Iron Man will need the help of Jessica's alter ego...the spectacular SPIDER-WOMAN!
name: Web of Lies

description: The Living Laser is back, and having merged with the aurora borealis, he's laying waste to the Great White North. Iron Man had better call in the cavalry! Wait, no--the Mounties! No, better yet--Canada's greatest super heroes, ALPHA FLIGHT!
name: Northern Lights

description: At long last, Iron Man is reunited with his missing father in the heart of Africa--but he has to free him from the clutches of Kiber the Cruel!
name: Kiber the Cruel
The Rustler's Train / The Amazing Vision Of Chief Sharp Fang / Redskin Rendezvous / Chief For A Day

description: Having survived a harrowing train ambush, Arthur, Whitefeather and Lance band together to rescue the remaining miners. The newly-formed alliance then travels back to Telacoma, intent on taking care of some unfinished business with their nemesis-- Telacoma's overlord, Talbot Leary.
name: First Canon Of Justice
Go Fetch; Too Close For Comfort; Most Prized Possession
A Riot of Fun

description:
Features Include:


Chapter 1 The Coming Of The Khan!
Chapter 2 Trapped in the Swampland!
Chapter 3 Terror Underground!
Chapter 4 The Yellow Invasion Begins!
Chapter 5 Fight to the Finish!
Danger in the Dunes
He Solves The Last Murder Mystery
Don't Cross Your Bridgework Until It Bites You!
Killer Diller Returns to the Pen in the Big House
Square Gang Buster Busts Up Dope Ring!
name: The Coming Of The Khan!

description:
Features Include:


The Most Amazing Story Of All Time...
Undiscovered Treasure
Hocus Pocus
Search For Cinnamon Candy
The Revenge of Egg-Head
name: The Most Amazing Story Of All Time...

description:
Features Include:


Horror In Hollywood
Kid Crime-Buster
Your Life Depends On It!
Bush-League Gatekeeper
name: Horror In Hollywood

description:
Features Include:


School For Sabotage
The Comet of Doom
The Week After Pearl Harbor
name: School For Sabotage

description:
Features Include:


Meet The Ambassador Of Death
Origin of Tommy Tyme
The Scratch of Death
Football Frolics
name: Meet The Ambassador Of Terror

description:
Features Include:


North Africa Ahoy
The Spirit of '76
Terror of the Rising Sun
name: North Africa Ahoy

description:
Features Include:


The Bloody Henchman
Attila the Hun
Toward the Land of the Condemned
name: The Bloody Henchman

description:
Features Include:


Dreams For Sale
Pie-Eyed Plunder
The Mad Monarchs of Rome
The Crown of Quetzacoatl
name: Dreams For Sale
